image_and_persona.description: Hypebeast brawlerâ€”limited-edition streetwear, diamond grills, sleeveless hoodies showing off boxing scars. Rocking his own energy drink like it's holy water. Unfiltered and untouchable, thrives in controversy. He's the influencer-turned-icon, the heel who became the headliner.

musical_style.description: Flashy, defiant, and chronically online. Packed with catchphrases, clapbacks, and viral references. Confident and cocky, blending rap cadence with podcast pacing. Sounds like he's vlogging mid-verse.
